briefdescription.para: Default number of input channels (legacy, use config instead).
Default number of output channels (legacy, use config instead).
Allocate all field vectors for given number of columns.

detaileddescription.para: Allocates import and export field vectors. The net_inputs and net_outputs vectors are cleared but not pre-allocated (they are sized dynamically in prepare_inputs()).

briefdescription.para: Set default climatological values for export fields.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes export fields with reasonable default values for testing.

simplesect.para: true if allocate() has been called

briefdescription.para: Get pointer to a field vector by name.

detaileddescription.para: Looks up the field in the hardcoded field map, then in dynamic fields.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the field vector, or nullptr if not found

briefdescription.para: Register or create a dynamic field.

detaileddescription.para: If the field doesn't exist (not in hardcoded or dynamic fields), creates a new entry in dynamic_fields. If already allocated, resizes the new field to match ncols.

briefdescription.para: Field storage container for atmosphere emulator.

detaileddescription.para: Manages all field vectors for the atmosphere component, including:

listitem.para: Import fields (x2a) received from other components via coupler
Export fields (a2x) sent to other components via coupler
Dynamic fields for configurable I/O variables

sect2.title: Allocation
sect2.para: Call allocate(ncols) to allocate all field vectors for the given number of local columns. The net_inputs and net_outputs vectors are allocated dynamically by EmulatorAtm::prepare_inputs().

sect2.title: Field Access
sect2.para: Fields can be accessed directly or via get_field_ptr() for string-based lookup. Dynamic fields can be registered at runtime via register_dynamic_field().
